title: Fractured Dynasty
description: It was supposed to be my happily ever after.For the first time in a long time, there was a promise of peace. So my Italian heirs and I made plans—big, life-changing plans, and tried to move on with our lives.But I was naive to think that there weren’t snakes lying in the grass, just waiting for the opportune time to strike.It was a blow no one saw coming.We didn’t start this war, but with the help of our unexpected allies, we’re sure as h*ll going to end it.I vowed that I would never sit idle while my family is in danger.And I never break a promise.
author: Penelope Black
